column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!//// Â  My friends suggested we share the Sangria
column2: which was surprisingly refreshing and not too sweet. After that
column3: it's hard to know exactly happened. A parade of delicious hit our table
column4: starting with chorizo dates and ending with a sampling of 4 of their desserts. I would like to say what my favorite dishes were(grilled squid? brussels sprouts?)
column5: but honestly each plate was as good as the one before it
column6: and it is impossible to pick a favorite. All I can say is go
column7: and decide for yourself. Bring a big group and a big appetite
